feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:22 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 12:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa steady
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: SW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few flurries and periods of freezing rain changing to a few rain showers and periods of freezing rain and ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 9:23 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023
